alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 8:21PM CST until January 29 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Marengo, Greene and Hale Counties. .The Black Warrior River at Selden Lock and Dam is forecast to crest right at flood stage Sunday night. A flood warning remains in effect. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING TO EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River at Selden Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Sunday evening to early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 90.0 feet, Pasture and wood lands begin to flood. Livestock should be moved to higher ground at stages above 90 feet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Friday the stage was 87.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 90.0 feet Sunday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 90.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
